LanguageData.TM_EnchantedBodyHD.label: Enchanted Body
LanguageData.TM_EnchantedBodyHD.description: Creation of enchanted body parts to enhance physical capability.
LanguageData.TM_EnchantedBodyHD.stages.0.label: Arm
LanguageData.TM_EnchantedBodyHD.stages.1.label: Two Arms
LanguageData.TM_EnchantedBodyHD.stages.2.label: Arms and Eye
LanguageData.TM_EnchantedBodyHD.stages.3.label: Arms and Eye ++
LanguageData.TM_EnchantedAuraHD.label: Enchanted Aura
LanguageData.TM_EnchantedAuraHD.description: An enchanted aspect surrounds the pawn enhancing qualities considered for beauty, endearment, and attraction.
LanguageData.TM_EnchantedAuraHD.stages.0.label: I
LanguageData.TM_EnchantedAuraHD.stages.1.label: II
LanguageData.TM_EnchantedAuraHD.stages.2.label: III
LanguageData.TM_EnchantedAuraHD.stages.3.label: IV
LanguageData.TM_ShapeshiftHD.label: Shapeshifter
LanguageData.TM_ShapeshiftHD.description: Improves the power of any animal form taken by a shape shifter.
LanguageData.TM_ShapeshiftHD.stages.0.label: I
LanguageData.TM_ShapeshiftHD.stages.1.label: II
LanguageData.TM_ShapeshiftHD.stages.2.label: III
LanguageData.TM_ShapeshiftHD.stages.3.label: IV
LanguageData.TM_WeaponEnchantment_FireHD.label: Enchanted Weapon
LanguageData.TM_WeaponEnchantment_FireHD.description: Enchants the currently equipped weapon with elemental fire that can burn or set fire to an object. This enchantment will end if the weapon is unequipped or swapped.
LanguageData.TM_WeaponEnchantment_IceHD.label: Enchanted Weapon
LanguageData.TM_WeaponEnchantment_IceHD.description: Enchants the currently equipped weapon with elemental ice that inflicts frostbite. This enchantment will end if the weapon is unequipped or swapped.
LanguageData.TM_WeaponEnchantment_LitHD.label: Enchanted Weapon
LanguageData.TM_WeaponEnchantment_LitHD.description: Enchants the currently equipped weapon with elemental lightning that sends stunning shockwaves through an object. This enchantment will end if the weapon is unequipped or swapped.
LanguageData.TM_WeaponEnchantment_DarkHD.label: Enchanted Weapon
LanguageData.TM_WeaponEnchantment_DarkHD.description: Enchants the currently equipped weapon with a touch of darkness that causes blindness. This enchantment will end if the weapon is unequipped or swapped.
